info.title: OpenAtlas API
info.description: An API that allows user to access data from an OpenAtlas instance.

servers.description: Used directly in an OpenAtlas instance

tags.name: Entity Endpoint
tags.description: Endpoint provide information about one entity in the OpenAtlas instance. The requested information is provided in Linked Places format (LPF). Alternatively, GeoJSON or RDFs, derived from the LPF data, can be accessed.

tags.name: Entity Query Endpoint
tags.description: Endpoint provide information about one entity in the OpenAtlas instance. The requested information is provided in Linked Places format (LPF). Alternatively, GeoJSON or RDFs, derived from the LPF data, can be accessed. Combine several or all entities endpoints in one query.

tags.name: Entities Endpoint
tags.description: Endpoints provide information about entities in the OpenAtlas instance. The requested information is provided in Linked Places format (LPF). Alternatively, GeoJSON or RDFs, derived from the LPF data, can be accessed.

tags.name: Type Endpoints
tags.description: Provide information about Types of an OpenAtlas instance. The results are in JSON and in a custom format.

tags.name: Administrative Endpoints
tags.description: Provide metadata of the OpenAtlas instance for presentation sites.

get.description: Retrieves all information about a single entity

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list with entity ID, CIDOC CRM code, system class, or menu item. Combine up to four of the Entities Endpoints in a single query. Each request has to be a new parameter.
get.summary: Combine several or all entities endpoints in one query

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of entities, based on their OpenAtlas class name.

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of entities based on their OpenAtlas menu items.

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieve a list of entities, based on their CIDOC CRM class code.

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieve the last entered entities. n represents the amount of entities retrieved (between 1 and 100). The pagination information is always null.

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Used to retrieve a list of entities, based on their OpenAtlas type ID. For an endpoint that lists all available types click confer Types Endpoints

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Used to retrieve a list of entities, based on their OpenAtlas type ID including all connected subtypes.. For an endpoint that lists all available types click confer Type Endpoints

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of entities linked to the entity with the stated ID.

200.description: Results of entities linked to entity

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all OpenAtlas types sorted by custom, places, standard and value

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all OpenAtlas types, including their information sorted by their IDs

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all system types

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available classes, their CIDOC CRM mapping, their view, which icon can be used, if alias and references systems are allowed and which standard type it has.

200.description: List of all classes for presentation sites

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a detailed list of information on available frontend content in an OpenAtlas instance - intro, legal notice, contact, and size of processed image

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a detailed list of the numbers of entries connected to a system class

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Displays all subunits of a place in a special format as used by the THANADOS project. Can only be used for “places”. As format only XML can be chosen

get.description: Retrieve a GeoJSON of all chosen geometries in an OpenAtlas instance

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Downloads all information in an OpenAtlas instance as CSV, XML, or JSON.

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves the respective image if it has a licence.

200.description: Retrieves the respective image if it has a licence

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

count.name: count
count.description: Just show count of how many entities would the result give back

show.name: show
show.description: Select which keys should not be displayed. This can improve performance

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Sorting result ascending or descending of the given column. Default value is asc.

column.name: column
column.description: Choose one column to sort the results by. Default value is name.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limits the entities displayed. Influences the performance of the request. Default value is 20. 0 means all available entities will be displayed.

first.name: first
first.description: Begin results at the given entity id.

last.name: last
last.description: Begin results after the given entity id.

export.name: export
export.description: Export the entities into either a simple CSV representation or a zip file of CSV's especially designed for network analyses.

format.name: format
format.description: Choose the format for the results.

type_id.name: type_id
type_id.description: Show only entities with the given type id.

relation_type.name: relation_type
relation_type.description: Displays only connections connected by the selected CIDOC CRM code.

geometry.name: geometry
geometry.description: Filters which geometries will be received. Default is gisAll

entities.name: entities
entities.description: Entity ids which will be requested

image_size.name: image_size
image_size.description: Select which size of the image you want to display. Values are fixed but can be changed for each OpenAtlas instance. Thumbnail is 200px and table 100px.
